001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.optimizer.steps;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.linalg.Vector;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.linalg.Vectors;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars.LinearCombination;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.optimizer.LearningRateConfigurable;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.optimizer.UpdateStep;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regularization.ExplicitRegularization;
009import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regularization.Regularizations;
010
011import java.util.Map;
012import java.util.Set;
013
014public class VanillaGradientDescent<N extends Number> implements UpdateStep<LinearCombination<N>, N>, LearningRateConfigurable<N> {
015
016    private N learningRate;
017
018    public VanillaGradientDescent(N learningRate) {
019        this.learningRate = learningRate;
020    }
021
022    @Override
023    public Vector<N> calculateUpdate(Vector<N> gradients, LinearCombination<N> model, int step, Set<ExplicitRegularization<N>> regularizations) {
024        N[] parameters = model.getParameters();
025        Vector<N> thetas = Vectors.of(model.getCurrentNumberType(), parameters).transpose();
026        Vector<N> regularizationGradients = Regularizations.applyExplicitRegularization(regularizations, thetas, gradients);
027        return regularizationGradients.multiply(model.getCurrentNumberType().negate(learningRate));
028    }
029
030    @Override
031    public Map<String, Object> getHyperparameters() {
032        return Map.of(HP_LEARNING_RATE, learningRate);
033    }
034
035    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
036    @Override
037    public void setHyperparameter(String name, Object value) {
038        if (HP_LEARNING_RATE.equals(name)) {
039            this.learningRate = (N) value;
040        }
041    }
042}
